data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Penz, Carla M., Casagrande, Mirna M., Devries, Phil, Simonsen, Thomas J. (2017): Documenting diversity in the Amazonian butterfly genus Bia (Lepidoptera, Nymphalidae). Zootaxa 4258 (3): 201-237, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4258.3.1|25 occurrences
